Chattanooga.Brainerd Mission:
The Brainerd Mission was a Christian mission to the Cherokee in Chattanooga, Tennessee. The associated Brainerd Mission Cemetery is the only part that still remains, and is listed on the National Register of Historic Places.


== History ==
Brainerd Mission was established in 1817 by Cyrus Kingsbury, working on behalf of the American Board of Commissioners for Foreign Missions.
